The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/chiragtankwal/projects/GST_BILLIN.serviceRawFile:
service: gst-billing-backend

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: us-east-1
  memorySize: 2048
  timeout: 30
  stage: dev
  environment:
    USERS_TABLE: GST_USERS
    BUSINESSES_TABLE: GST_BUSINESSES
    PARTIES_TABLE: GST_PARTIES
    PRODUCTS_TABLE: GST_PRODUCTS
    INVOICES_TABLE: GST_INVOICES
    APP_DATA_TABLE: GST_APP_DATA
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET, 'dev-secret-key-change-in-prod'}
    ADMIN_SECRET_KEY: ${env:ADMIN_SECRET_KEY, 'dev-admin-secret-key'}
    UPLOADS_BUCKET: !Ref UploadsBucket
    REGION: ${self:provider.region}
    PHONEPE_CLIENT_ID: ${env:PHONEPE_CLIENT_ID}
    PHONEPE_CLIENT_SECRET: ${env:PHONEPE_CLIENT_SECRET}
    PHONEPE_CLIENT_VERSION: ${env:PHONEPE_CLIENT_VERSION}
    PHONEPE_ENV: ${env:PHONEPE_ENV}
    PHONEPE_REDIRECT_URL: ${env:PHONEPE_REDIRECT_URL}
    PHONEPE_WEBHOOK_USERNAME: ${env:PHONEPE_WEBHOOK_USERNAME}
    PHONEPE_WEBHOOK_PASSWORD: ${env:PHONEPE_WEBHOOK_PASSWORD}
  apiGateway:
    binaryMediaTypes:
      - 'multipart/form-data'
      - 'image/png'
      - 'image/jpeg'
      - 'image/jpg'
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:Scan
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
          Resource:
            - Fn::GetAtt: [UsersTable, Arn]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [UsersTable, Arn], 'index', 'EmailIndex' ] ]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [UsersTable, Arn], 'index', 'ApprovalStatusIndex' ] ]
            - Fn::GetAtt: [BusinessesTable, Arn]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [BusinessesTable, Arn], 'index', 'ApprovalStatusIndex' ] ]
            - Fn::GetAtt: [PartiesTable, Arn]
            - Fn::GetAtt: [ProductsTable, Arn]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [ProductsTable, Arn], 'index', 'GSI1' ] ]
            - Fn::GetAtt: [InvoicesTable, Arn]
            - Fn::GetAtt: [AppDataTable, Arn]
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - s3:PutObject
            - s3:PutObjectAcl
          Resource:
            - Fn::Join: ['', [Fn::GetAtt: [UploadsBucket, Arn], '/*']]

# Note: PDF generation uses Chromium; if timeouts occur, increase timeout for the api function (e.g. 60) or split PDF into a separate Lambda with higher memory/timeout.
functions:
  api:
    handler: src/app.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY

resources:
  Resources:
    # 1. Users Table (GST_USERS) - The only active table for Phase 1
    UsersTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.USERS_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: userId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: email
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: approvalStatus
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: userId
            KeyType: HASH
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: EmailIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: email
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
          - IndexName: ApprovalStatusIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: approvalStatus
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

    # 2. Businesses Table
    BusinessesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.BUSINESSES_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: userId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: businessId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: approvalStatus
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: userId
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: businessId
            KeyType: RANGE
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: ApprovalStatusIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: approvalStatus
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

    # 3. Parties Table
    PartiesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.PARTIES_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: PK
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: SK
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: PK
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: SK
            KeyType: RANGE
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
    
    # 4. Products Table
    ProductsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.PRODUCTS_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: PK
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: SK
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: GSI1-PK
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: GSI1-SK
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: PK
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: SK
            KeyType: RANGE
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: GSI1
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: GSI1-PK
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: GSI1-SK
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

    # 5. Invoices Table
    InvoicesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.INVOICES_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: PK
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: SK
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: PK
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: SK
            KeyType: RANGE
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

    # 6. App Data Table (single table: settings, packages, user subscriptions)
    AppDataTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.APP_DATA_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: PK
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: SK
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: PK
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: SK
            KeyType: RANGE
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

    # 7. Uploads S3 Bucket
    UploadsBucket:
      Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
      Properties:
        BucketName: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-${self:provider.region}-chirag-uploads
        PublicAccessBlockConfiguration:
          BlockPublicAcls: false
          BlockPublicPolicy: false
          IgnorePublicAcls: false
          RestrictPublicBuckets: false
        OwnershipControls:
          Rules:
            - ObjectOwnership: BucketOwnerPreferred
        CorsConfiguration:
          CorsRules:
            - AllowedHeaders: ['*']
              AllowedMethods: [GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, HEAD]
              AllowedOrigins: ['*']
              MaxAge: 3000

    # Bucket Policy for Public Read Access (Optional/Recommended for public URLs)
    UploadsBucketPolicy:
      Type: AWS::S3::BucketPolicy
      Properties:
        Bucket: !Ref UploadsBucket
        PolicyDocument:
          Version: '2012-10-17'
          Statement:
            - Effect: Allow
              Principal: '*'
              Action: s3:GetObject
              Resource: !Join ['', [!GetAtt UploadsBucket.Arn, '/*']]

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
